transcript.text: Unauthorized access to our intellectual property is a real threat to Johnson Controls. In this module, learn what you need to do to protect our IP.

panelText.text: Intellectual property is a vital part of our competitive advantage.
Our intellectual property is critical to our business, so we all have a duty to protect it and to make sure it doesn’t fall into the wrong hands.
We also have a responsibility to protect and respect the intellectual property that belongs to others.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
